name: Writr
body:
Writr is a fully collaborative platform which is perfect for all types of writers. Everything is updated in real time - new stories, new authors, new content, votes, etc. This helps us promote complete collaboration amongst our users. Whether you are an aspiring writer or have got some experience under your belt - combine minds with other like-minded individuals and create your next story one sentence at a time.
The clean interface will allow you to focus on your writing without distractions. The contribution panel allows you to monitor exactly who has added to your story. Visit any user's profile and check out their stories and contributions to get new ideas for your next story!

Key features:
- 100% real time updates for all content
- Clean, distraction-free interface
- User profiles
- Social login ability with Google and Twitter accounts. Alternatively you may also create an account with us.
- Story contribution panel
- Story voting
- Sharing on social sites
